name: IPData
description: This cog returns various info about given IP.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
This cog shows various info about given IP. Please note that it requires an API key.
You can get one by signing up at : https://ipdata.co/sign-up.html
Once you received API key, set it with:
`[p]set api ipdata api_key <api_key>`
author: siu3334
